title: (x) "Summer Shack" bubblegum sans - hand drawn (various alternatives) {Yves, gang}
content:
this one is beyond me.

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [summer shack.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20110731200558/http:/typophile.com/files/summer%20shack.jpg) | 96.6 KB |
author: drax911sc

comments.content: Beyond us, too, without a visual :)
Fixed the image. Don't know what it is tho.

Just took a good look -- this is hand drawn. Repeating characters (UC 'S' and 'M') are not identical.

Maybe there are fonts out there that look like that.

The classic from the 70s, which I think this is probably based on, is David West's Bubblegum. I have a digital version of it, and I'll try to track down the source.

You could also try the newer [Magical Mystery Tour](http://web.archive.org/web/20110731200558/http:/www.k-type.com/freebies.html) (#19, a free download), or [Wubble](http://web.archive.org/web/20110731200558/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/typodermic/wubble/).

Skylar

Fellow Stockholm typophile Göran Söderström also did a lovely font in the same vein called [Autostyler](http://web.archive.org/web/20110731200558/http:/www.autodidakt.se/index.php?page=autostyler), which is available on request.

House Industries Poolhouse is similar too.

[http://www.houseind.com/index.php?page=showfont&id=14&subpage=viewfonts](http://web.archive.org/web/20110731200558/http:/www.houseind.com/index.php?page=showfont&id=14&subpage=viewfonts "http://www.houseind.com/index.php?page=showfont&id=14&subpage=viewfonts")
Thanks, all the suggestions were very helpful.
